item.description: At this meetup we will make a few cards and have some fun. The card shown is a card from last month's meeting. $5 fee to cover the supplies. There are 3 times available 6 pm, 7 PM and 8 pm. At the 6-7 time slot, you may bring a child ages 10-15 for an additional $5. They can do the projects with you. After 7PM, no children please. Some of us mom's want the escape!

group.name: The Merrimac Valley Paper Crafters Social Meetup Group

item.name: The Merrimac Valley Paper Crafters Social September Meetup
